name: Helheim (itch)
description:
Helheim

Made by:

-Baptistin BERTHELOT / 3D Artist, Level Design, Artistic                   Director berthelotbaptistin@gmail.com

Contact us!

It is heavily inspired by the viking era, and mythology from the different places you will go through, in this 3D platformer. Puzzles and speed are the keys to finish the game, with a speedrunnable design.

Credits:

-Ulf Söderberg - Ammons Hav

-Sephiroth - Heliopolis
